glomeulus_number                6

Podocyte_counts_Sarah          48
Podocyte_counts_James          48

51715, LPD, female, STZ, 24 weeks old
LPD = low protein diet
STZ = Streptozotocin (a drug that induces diabetes)

The corresponding marker file is from Sarah G.
